Reviews.Title: Good Pictures, Low Price
Reviews.Author: Rainmaker "Jeff"
Reviews.Content: This camera worked great in the pool and the Carribean Sea. The pictures were very good if you or your subject did not move too much.  No water got in the camera case.  Pictures of objects in the distance were distorted on the ends due to the camera case.  I purchased this camera and a digital camera maskLiquid Image Exploer Series 3.1MP Underwater Mask - Digital Camera that cost $150.  This camera took pictures almost as good as the $150 model.  We used it for 2 weeks without troubles.  Take lots of photos, or use the video for a minute or less.  Larger video files can slow down computers during playback.

Reviews.Title: Intova Snap Sights Cam (SS-1000)
Reviews.Author: William Sante "W. Sante"
Reviews.Content: I found this camera to be a huge nuisance to use.  Both photographer and subject must remain perfectly still or picture will be blurry..no forgiveness there.  Unfortunately, this is always difficult with any water sport or activity.  Also, the shutter button is very difficult to push (as are all of the buttons) and the overall size of the camera is very small, both adding to the difficulty of holding the camera still when taking pictures.  Abundant light is required or, again, your pictures will come out blurry.  Many of my photos were distorted, too.  For example, my fishing pole in some pictures was wavy, likely caused by glare off the plastic case and, more so, distortion caused by light shining though the multiple (6) raised dots on the case (I suspect these are a novelty added to the case design to resemble water drops).  The viewfinder is only about an inch square, so it is essentially impossible to use other than to get a general idea where your subject is located, especially for videos.  It is difficult to see if the camera was still recording or not.  Daylight makes it that much harder to see anything in it.  Finally, it would frequently shut off.  Not sure if this is a power saving function, but it became very irritating during use.  I will cut my loses on this camera and buy something else. The only pluses I found with the product were the case remained water tight during use and USB download of the pics and videos is straight forward.  Oh, there was no memory card included...the packaging states a memory card up to 2MB can be used.  I purchased one seperately.

Reviews.Title: Underwater loveliness!
Reviews.Author: aimee wright

} } } Length:: 0:03 MinsI love this underwater camera, it's affordable & take nice lo-fi shots too! - I would recommend it outside though 'coz shots made indoor are dark. One thing I wanted this camera to have in the future is an audio. Other than that, been loving it.

Reviews.Title: Not for small children
Reviews.Author: miki kenny "miki"
Reviews.Content: I got these for my 6 years old and 8 years old children. I thought I can remove the cover to use above water, but "no", even when you are not using under water, you still need the cover in order to camera to function. Well, that's fine.... But the shutter and the buttons are super hard to push, my children are having very hard time clicking them, I think it might be no problems with adults.The camera quality is good for kids, but not be able to function with my kids due to the super hard shutter..... I should have payed more to get a little better ones.

Reviews.Title: Best cost-benefit
Reviews.Author: Mauricio
Reviews.Content: I didn't know what to expect from this small and cheap camera, since the simmilars that can operate at the same deep are much more expensive, but I was really surprised, because it has a good quality and is quite easy of use. Although I undersntand that its primary use is for videos (and allways when I turn on it it goes to video mode), it did several photos with good quality. Videos are also good, don't expect an excellent frame rate, but it has a good quality. The only point that is quite poor is that its small screen doesn't help too much underwater, it's quite difficult to see things on it specially if you are using a dive mask. But, as I said before, it worths its price.

Reviews.Title: Adequate
Reviews.Author: Caldera Gnash Rho
Reviews.Content: There is nothing terribly special about this camera. It's better than nothing, but don't expect much out of it.  You do have to hold still or else the image will be blurry and that it is pretty hard to hold still in the water with any kind of waves.The video quality is pretty good.  I thought it was a better video camera than still picture camera.

Reviews.Title: great video
Reviews.Author: Okie Bobby
Reviews.Content: This a GREAT video camera.  For still pictures, it is okay (so so, definitely not great).  But hey, underwater video; 'it's all good.'Ingenious simple design.

Reviews.Title: Intova waterproof camera
Reviews.Author: Sener / Turkey
Reviews.Content: The only thing good with this camera is the waterproof case, it is really good. But all the rest are rubish. Camera arrived with 3 dead pixels, the image quality very poor, video sometimes jumps about 0.5~1 seconds, it sucks the batteries and it can turn off at anytime. I am not happy at all. This camera can be only a toy for kids.

Reviews.Title: Picture Quality very low.
Reviews.Author: Dcode
Reviews.Content: It does what it says, but you get what you pay for.  Picture quality is very low, buttons are very hard to push (i'm no weekling either).  2gb Micro SD card DID NOT come with the product as it stated in the description.I decided to purchase the Sony Cyber-Shot TX5 instead of using this.  TX5 is much better.Product Features say:2 G Micro SD Card included and USB compatible

Reviews.Title: Sinks Below the Competition (Pun Intended)
Reviews.Author: Punderful
Reviews.Content: While you really can't go wrong for the price, there are much better options on the market for surprisingly affordable prices.  It works quite well and takes relatively good pictures for what it is and what it costs, but does suffer from a number of drawbacks.  Firstly, the internal storage is enough for about 30 pictures, which is not unexpected, but it only accommodates micro-SD cards.  Not a problem, right, until you consider that it can only handle ones of a 2GB size and smaller.  That's number two, most stores do not carry those sizes any longer because of demand so do not get caught on vacation without adequate cards.  The upside is that the pictures, in my experience, take only about 200KB of storage, meaning you can get a tad under 1,000 pictures on a card assuming no video.  Finally, with the explosion in technology and dropping prices, there is little need to get this type of starter camera unless you are getting it for an adolescent.I upgraded this to the Fuji XJ50, still a starter in my opinion, a year or so ago for better HD video and pictures and am incredibly pleased.  I've kept this on hand as a just in case back-up.

Reviews.Title: Good buy
Reviews.Author: Kristin Meyer
Reviews.Content: This little underwater camera is easy to use and surprisingly takes very good pictures.  I would recommend it for snorkeling or lounging by the pool.

Reviews.Title: review
Reviews.Author: Ej
Reviews.Content: For the money you can't beat it.  I would buy it again.  That's all I have to say on this matter

Reviews.Title: not what i expected
Reviews.Author: Ocram
Reviews.Content: Its an okay buy, but i wanted it to show a little more clearer.  It takes ok pics underwater but only in clear water from what i see.  I took some videos, and pic and they show good between the ranges of 5 and 20 feet.  but what else u expect for 40 buxks i guess

Reviews.Title: Great for swim coaching.
Reviews.Author: Allen J. DeWeese
Reviews.Content: Great underwater images in pool, focal distance just right for stroke critiquing, no extra lighting needed. Instructions and controls require a little time to figure out. Camera screen hard to see for filming or playback, but computer images excellent (USB cable included). Unbeatable for the price. You can get the required silicone grease for the gasket for $3 in the plumbing dept at Home Depot. You will need a memory card for video, I got a 4 gig one for $5 shipped on Amazon. Make sure to use quality batteries, cheap ones don't last long.

Reviews.Title: Difficult to see the pictures
Reviews.Author: Carla kitsuta
Reviews.Content: As described, the camera is basically the components in a very resistant box. I have not yet tried it under the water, but it seems to work ok. I found it very difficult to see the pictures in the LCD screen because it is too dark. Also the buttons are hard to use, suppose this is the problem with any cover. As my purpose is mainly to have fun with my kids, this camera works well, but if I wanted to really take pictures during underwater activities I would look for something else.

Reviews.Title: Just Awful
Reviews.Author: dawn mccormick
Reviews.Content: Buttons hard to press, blurry pictures, I guess you get what you paid for but save even the 30.00 this camera is no good,

Reviews.Title: So bad, it's good
Reviews.Author: Peter J.
Reviews.Content: The picture quality of this camera is atrocious.  It'll give you some interesting low-fi shots, but nothing more.That said, it's fun to use and served it's purpose (even in salt water).

Reviews.Title: Worst thing ever
Reviews.Author: C Strate
Reviews.Content: Camera pooped out after 15 pictures.  It just quit and would not power on.  checked batteries and tryed everything with no luck.  really disappointed after buying just over a month ago, packed the camera for Hawaii, then get back only to find out that the return period had ended one day before we returned home.  Not worth the shipping on return/replacement considering we wont be needing for quite some time and that even if we did I would not trust a replacement to perform any better.  Look for another brand.  Avoid this one

Reviews.Title: No Flash
Reviews.Author: IT Geek
Reviews.Content: Camera is OK but not great. It doesn't have a flash, even one use cameras have a flash theses days. It also automatically turns itself off after one minute which seems like a nice feature unless you actually want to use the camera, duh?

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: Laurie
Reviews.Content: This is junk, don't waste your money.  Buttons are really hard, not easy to preview pictures that were taken.  Don't spend your money on this.

Reviews.Title: Waste of my Money
Reviews.Author: lala0620
Reviews.Content: I was so excited to use this on our trip to Hawaii.  Unfortunately it didn't come with the memory card so we weren't able to use it the first day.  Then we took out for snorkeling, but it broke and got waterlogged leaking battery within 10 minutes of our snorkel.  We followed the directions and verified the waterproof case was sealed so we wither got a faulty one or they are just made too cheaply.

Reviews.Title: Would not recommend
Reviews.Author: Realop
Reviews.Content: The camera was difficult to operate with cover on. No flash. Pictures quality was bad. You get what you paid for with this cheap product.

Reviews.Title: U get what u payfor
Reviews.Author: Raks77
Reviews.Content: The product is okay nothing great but for it's money it is a decent waterproof camera only problem is that the buttons are hard to press specially when u are in water so by the time u to press it the thing u were tryin to take a picture of has swum off. It is a good idea to take a few practise shots before really using it.

Reviews.Title: garbage
Reviews.Author: bettg
Reviews.Content: this is the worst product I have ever bought at Amazon. It never worked. First it did not come with a micro sd-so when I went on vacation in the Caribbean NO ONE carried a micro sd-so couldn't use it. When I returned I bought one and the camera batteries were not working-bought new ones..after spending $22 plus batteries the camera STILL did not work on my next vacation. Unfortunately to late to get my money back but not to late to never buy from Amazon again. DO NOT BUY THIS CAMERA.

Reviews.Title: Broke Real Fast. Not Worth The Money. Short Life On Return.
Reviews.Author: Franco
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera and used it maybe 3 times. The picture button does not click and it will not take pictures. When I went to return it, the expiration date for the return was a day ago. I just got the camera, short lived return. I would never purchase this product again.

Reviews.Title: Good and cheap
Reviews.Author: CR
Reviews.Content: You can use it for fun, it is really cheap. I used it to take pics in the pool and in the ocean.I took videos of fish, and they look pretty good.The buttons are hard to push, but I think I will get use to it.It has LCD screen, not as big as I will like to, but it works.You can put a microSD for more pics.And it is lightweight.Usually waterproof cameras are really expensive, so this is a good option if you want to try photography under the water.

Reviews.Title: Misleading Product Description
Reviews.Author: Cathy
Reviews.Content: The product description specifically states a "2G Micro SD Card Included."  When the product was received however their was no SD Card and the package clearly stated it did NOT included an SD card.  We had to go out and purchase one to use the camera.
